product_name: Brooks Silver Bullet Wind Tights - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Brooks Silver Bullet Wind tights for women take the bite out of runs in cold, windy weather thanks to a windproof, water-resistant fabric with a heat-boosting aluminum membrane. Fabric cuts through wind and sheds light moisture, and moisture-wicking lining improves fit and feels soft against skin. Aluminum membrane retains heat without increasing weight of garment. Stretch-knit panels with articulated knees maximize movement. Reflective highlights increase visibility from any angle. Offset ankle zippers make it easy to put on pants without removing shoes. The Brooks Silver Bullet Wind tights for women offer a next-to-body fit. Closeout.
short_description: The Brooks Silver Bullet Wind tights for women take the bite out of runs in cold, windy weather thanks to a windproof, water-resistant fabric with a heat-boosting aluminum membrane.
